mapper.sql: select a.id, a.creation, a.lastmod, a."version", a.proc, a.model, a.art, a.qty, proc.id proc_id, proc.uid proc_uid, proc.gid proc_gid, proc.mode proc_mode, proc.acl proc_acl, proc.label proc_label, proc.description proc_description, proc.icon proc_icon, proc.priority proc_priority, proc.flags proc_flags, proc."state" proc_state, proc.creation proc_creation, proc.lastmod proc_lastmod, proc."version" proc_version, proc."valid" proc_valid, proc.validsince proc_validsince, proc.validuntil proc_validuntil, proc.props proc_props, proc."output" proc_output, proc.fn proc_fn, proc.duration proc_duration, proc.strict proc_strict, proc.test proc_test, model.id model_id, model.uid model_uid, model.gid model_gid, model.mode model_mode, model.acl model_acl, model.label model_label, model.description model_description, model.icon model_icon, model.priority model_priority, model.flags model_flags, model."state" model_state, model.creation model_creation, model.lastmod model_lastmod, model."version" model_version, model.t0 model_t0, model.t1 model_t1, model."year" model_year, model.props model_props, model."valid" model_valid, model.validsince model_validsince, model.validuntil model_validuntil, model.obsolete model_obsolete, model.art model_art, model.model model_model, art.id art_id, art.sku art_sku, art.barcode art_barcode, art.rfid art_rfid, art.uid art_uid, art.gid art_gid, art.mode art_mode, art.acl art_acl, art.label art_label, art.description art_description, art.icon art_icon, art.priority art_priority, art.flags art_flags, art."state" art_state, art.creation art_creation, art.lastmod art_lastmod, art."version" art_version, art.model art_model, art.proto art_proto, art.cat art_cat, art.phase art_phase, art.uom art_uom, art.props art_props, art.finish art_finish, art.price art_price from fabstdproc_in a left join fabstdproc proc on a.proc = proc.id left join artmodel model on a.model = model.id left join art art on a.art = art.id

select a.id, a.creation, a.lastmod, a."version", a.proc, a.model, a.art, a.qty, proc.id proc_id, proc.uid proc_uid, proc.gid proc_gid, proc.mode proc_mode, proc.acl proc_acl, proc.label proc_label, proc.description proc_description, proc.icon proc_icon, proc.priority proc_priority, proc.flags proc_flags, proc."state" proc_state, proc.creation proc_creation, proc.lastmod proc_lastmod, proc."version" proc_version, proc."valid" proc_valid, proc.validsince proc_validsince, proc.validuntil proc_validuntil, proc.props proc_props, proc."output" proc_output, proc.fn proc_fn, proc.duration proc_duration, proc.strict proc_strict, proc.test proc_test, model.id model_id, model.uid model_uid, model.gid model_gid, model.mode model_mode, model.acl model_acl, model.label model_label, model.description model_description, model.icon model_icon, model.priority model_priority, model.flags model_flags, model."state" model_state, model.creation model_creation, model.lastmod model_lastmod, model."version" model_version, model.t0 model_t0, model.t1 model_t1, model."year" model_year, model.props model_props, model."valid" model_valid, model.validsince model_validsince, model.validuntil model_validuntil, model.obsolete model_obsolete, model.art model_art, model.model model_model, art.id art_id, art.sku art_sku, art.barcode art_barcode, art.rfid art_rfid, art.uid art_uid, art.gid art_gid, art.mode art_mode, art.acl art_acl, art.label art_label, art.description art_description, art.icon art_icon, art.priority art_priority, art.flags art_flags, art."state" art_state, art.creation art_creation, art.lastmod art_lastmod, art."version" art_version, art.model art_model, art.proto art_proto, art.cat art_cat, art.phase art_phase, art.uom art_uom, art.props art_props, art.finish art_finish, art.price art_price from fabstdproc_in a left join fabstdproc proc on a.proc = proc.id left join artmodel model on a.model = model.id left join art art on a.art = art.id
mapper.insert: insert into fabstdproc_in( creation, lastmod, "version", proc, model, art, qty ) values( #{creationDate}, #{lastModified}, #{version}, #{processId}, #{modelId}, #{artifactId}, #{quantity} );
